local_intent: Transfer phase: push the T-block rightward after contact and yaw set, then verify the block is at the target outline.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT transfer: perceive t_block → align and establish contact → set yaw 0 → Push distance 0.2 at direction 0 → verify with IsAt(target_T). Uses only library nodes and binned values for constrained ports.
